bug.short_desc: Partial line returned in search results.

long_desc.thetext:
Problem exists in Opengrok 0.61 and 0.7
Searching for IRDFTL returns this:
179 MVC EBW089(L'IRDFTL-3),IRDFTL COVER THE DECIMAL POINT 261 IRDFTL),IRDFTL TOTAL TO WORK AREA 264 MVC EBW081(L'IRDFTL-4),IRDFTL COVER THE DEC PT
Line 261 reads:
MVC EBW080(L'IRDFTL),IRDFTL TOTAL TO WORK AREA
The file was processed by PlainAnalyzer: Adding: /gal/prod/s/ssh60c.asm (PlainAnalyzer)
Index was built with this command:
java ${JAVA_OPTS} -jar ${PROGDIR}/opengrok.jar -W gpamp-config.xml -m 150000 -a on -Q off -e -v -w gpamp -i .listing -c ${EXUB_CTAGS} -s ${SRC_ROOT} -d ${DATA_ROOT}

I haven't been able to reproduce this from the information in the bug report (I created a file containing the three lines mentioned in the bug description). Bruce, do you have a file you can upload that shows the problem?
